Pennyroyal Farm and Farmstead Cheese.knownFor: “ Goats, Cheese and Wine-- Perfect ” Reviewed June 29, 2016 Stopped in to see the goats and pick up some cheese, and lo-and-behold, found an excellent winery! Owner is the daughter of the Navarro family with the eponymous winery just up the road, as well as winemaker for both.
